content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -79.0)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory has been built yet.

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of a lab with an input of automation-science-pack.

### Pipe network at position (11.5, 7.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to a steam engine and a boiler.

### Pipe network at position (-9.5, 23.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to an offshore pump and a boiler.

### Electricity network at position (2.5, 2.5)
Consists of multiple small-electric-poles connected to various entities.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted.
- Check if the entity has available space for the item.
- Verify the item is compatible with the entity.

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel.
- Check if the burner mining drill is properly connected to a furnace or other entities.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is properly connected to a pipe network.
- Check if the offshore pump has a valid fluid input.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has fuel.
- Check if the boiler is properly connected to a pipe network and a steam engine.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine is properly connected to a boiler and a pipe network.
- Check if the steam engine has a valid fluid input.
